DOC.brief_summary: In patient unprotected leave main ( LM ) true bifurcation lesion ( cohort A ) , elective 2-stent strategy superior provisional strategy prevent occurrence 12-month target lesion failure percutaneous coronary intervention bifurcation lesion . In patient unprotected LM non-true bifurcation lesion ( cohort B ) , 1-stent technique mandatory final kissing ballooning superior 1-stent technique without kiss balloon prevent occurrence 12-month target lesion failure percutaneous coronary intervention bifurcation lesion .
DOC.brief_title: STRATEGY Left Main Coronary Bifurcation Lesion II
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age ≥20 year 2 . Left main bifurcation lesion coronary angiography 3 . Significant myocardial ischemia Main vessel ( left main coronary artery leave anterior descend artery ) and/or side branch ( left circumflex artery ) diameter stenosis > 75 % , diameter stenosis 5075 % angina and/or objective evidence ischemia noninvasive stress test 4 . Significant size main branch ( left anterior descend artery ) side branch ( left cirmflex artery ) The reference diameter branch ≥ 2.5 mm visual estimation 1 . The patient know hypersensitivity contraindication follow medication : Heparin , Aspirin , Clopidogrel , Biolimus 2 . Patients receive DES implantation target lesion prior enrollment
